response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $12,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a highly competitive rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.", "product_price": 12000}
